channel.title: Rust on The Coding Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on The Coding Notes

item.title: Learn Rust by Building a Full-stack Todo Application
item.description:
What

I want to write a blog about how I learned Rust.

Please forgive me that I just started learning such a great programming language in 2022.

To learn Rust by doing, I have built a full-stack todo application.

You can try it here. The source code is available at GitHub.

Here I am going to write about how to build it.

How

Firstly, as everyone beginning, I learn Rust from the book as well. It is an awesome book to start learning Rust, and you should not skip it.
